items.sentence: Tom stopped talking as soon as he noticed Mary wasn\'t listening anymore.
Tom told Mary he thought she was the most beautiful woman he\'d ever met.
Tom\'s living proof that you don\'t have to have brains to be successful.
We\'re always going there! Let\'s go to a French restaurant for a change.
Tom was rushed to the hospital after being found unconscious in his home.
Tom was sitting in a comfortable armchair, reading the evening newspaper.
Tom would have missed the train if he had stopped to buy a chocolate bar.
Why do the five yen coin and the fifty yen coin have holes in the center?
If it\'s at all possible, I\'d like you to take part in the next meeting.
Tom became interested in music because his neighbor was quite a musician.
